code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[message,setMessage]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{console.log('API URL:',process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL);fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setMessage(data.message)).catch(()=>setMessage('Backend not reachable'));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',padding:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"React Frontend"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["API Response: ",message]})]});}export default App;
